backend.src.app.repositories.blacklisttokens package

Submodules

backend.src.app.repositories.blacklisttokens.blacklisttokens_repository module

class backend.src.app.repositories.blacklisttokens.blacklisttokens_repository.BlacklistTokensRepository(jti)[source]

Bases: object

The BlacklistTokensRepository class provides methods for creating and storing BlacklistToken objects.

This class acts as a repository and uses the BlacklistToken model to perform operations related to blacklisted tokens.

save()[source]

Saves a BlacklistToken instance to the database.

This method sets the adding_time attribute of the BlacklistToken instance to the current time, and then adds it to the database session and commits it.
